title: Milestone 1: Done
message:
The first step in my blogging website project is done.

I was able to implement a Post/Feed functionality that allows you to write in one page and post it on another.

Next step is to create user profiles + authentication

title: User Authentication using email and password is DONE
message:
Registered users data are saved in a database

Upon login, the db is searched for the entered email and password

if there's a match the user is logged in.

Next up, Registration page + User profiles (requires session)

title: Registration page done!
message:
Just finished implementing a registration page.

It uses Regex to validate user input of username, email, and password.

User data is then inserted into the Users collection in the Blog database.

Next is implementing a 'session' mechanism that allows each user their own view of the website.

title: Session + some UI work done
message:
Implemented a session mechanism that determines which user is sending requests.

Improved the UI look of the login page and fixing responsiveness of the app as a whole.

title: Fixed Line break problem
message:
No more line breaks at the end of the message.
Currently workking on improving the UI as a whole and fixing the responsiveness
After that, creating user profiles, storing and displaying each message with user signature
